origin.toomanyorigins.dragonborn.name: Dragonborn
origin.toomanyorigins.dragonborn.descrip: Half Human, Half Dragon. Their ferocious breath and structure makes the inhabitants of The End bow before them.
origin.toomanyorigins.hare.name: Hare
origin.toomanyorigins.hare.description: A race of burrow dwelling rabbits that had attained a level of awareness akin to humans. They inherited their proficient mobility.
origin.toomanyorigins.hisskin.name: Hiss-kin
origin.toomanyorigins.hisskin.descriptio: This evolutionary path of creeper learned to control their explosions as to not harm the environment around them as a get-away tactic.
origin.toomanyorigins.swarm.name: Swarm
origin.toomanyorigins.swarm.description: These hive independent group of bees choose to stick together to overcome the obstacles of the outside world.
origin.toomanyorigins.undead.name: Undead
origin.toomanyorigins.undead.description: A rare genetic mutation allows this race to keep their humanity despite suffering the effects of the Infection.
origin.toomanyorigins.withered.name: Withered
origin.toomanyorigins.withered.descripti: Originally human, their ancestors have paid the price for harnessing the chaotic power of the Wither.
power.toomanyorigins.dragon_breath.name: Draconic Breath
power.toomanyorigins.dragon_breath.descr: You are able to conjure a ball of armour-piercing draconic flame that leaves a lingering cloud wherever it lands.
power.toomanyorigins.no_knockback.name: Steady Stance
power.toomanyorigins.no_knockback.descri: You stand strong and proud against your foes, taking no knockback from their attacks.
power.toomanyorigins.light_up.name: Wyrmsmith's Touch
power.toomanyorigins.light_up.descriptio: You can light furnaces, campfires and brewing stands with your breath alone.
power.toomanyorigins.loose_scales.name: Loose Scales
power.toomanyorigins.loose_scales.descri: Because of some loose scales on your back, you take more damage when hit from behind.
power.toomanyorigins.zenith_scales.name: Zenith Dragonhide
power.toomanyorigins.zenith_scales.descr: You have 2 more hearts of health than humans.
toomanyorigins.gui.badge.furnace: Look at a lightable block to use this power.
toomanyorigins.gui.badge.no_furnace: Do not look at a lightable block to use this power.
death.attack.dragonMagic.player: %1$s was roasted in dragon breath whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.dragonMagic.player.item: %1$s was roasted in dragon breath whilst trying to escape %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.indirectDragonMagic: %1$s was roasted in dragon breath by %2$s
death.attack.indirectDragonMagic.item: %1$s was roasted in dragon breath by %2$s using %3$s
power.toomanyorigins.bunny_hop.name: Bunny Hop
power.toomanyorigins.bunny_hop.descripti: You build up momentum while in the air which is added to your movement speed. You keep built up momentum momentarily while on the ground. You may also gain momentum with your active ability.
power.toomanyorigins.large_leap.name: Moon Leap
power.toomanyorigins.large_leap.descript: While sneaking your jump height has increases.
power.toomanyorigins.sugary_delicacy.des: Eating carrots and golden carrots fills your bunny hop momentum up to a quarter.
power.toomanyorigins.photophobia.name: Photophobia
power.toomanyorigins.photophobia.descrip: You are unable to sleep in bright light.
power.toomanyorigins.lightweight.name: Lightweight
power.toomanyorigins.lightweight.descrip: You have 2 less hearts of health than humans.
toomanyorigins.hare_sleep_fail: You need less light to sleep
power.toomanyorigins.overheat.name: Overheat
power.toomanyorigins.overheat.descriptio: You can rocket jump away from any object you're looking at. This sets your inner gunpowder on fire harming you in the process.
power.toomanyorigins.blast_immunity.name: Blast Resistant Skin
power.toomanyorigins.blast_immunity.desc: You are immune to all forms of explosive damage.
power.toomanyorigins.conductor.name: Conductor
power.toomanyorigins.conductor.descripti: When struck by lightning, you become charged.
power.toomanyorigins.sneaking_steps.name: Sneaking Steps
power.toomanyorigins.sneaking_steps.desc: As you are used to sneaking up on your prey, you move slightly slower.
power.toomanyorigins.ailurophobia.name: Ailurophobia
power.toomanyorigins.ailurophobia.descri: Being near cats or ocelots weakens and makes you slower.
death.attack.overheat.player: %1$s incinerated their insides whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.overheat.player.item: %1$s incinerated their insides whilst trying to escape %2$s using %3$s
power.toomanyorigins.hover_toggle.name: Hover
power.toomanyorigins.hover_toggle.descri: Being made up of multiple bees, you are able to hover midair whenever you are falling.
power.toomanyorigins.smoke_sensitivity.d: Your senses are lessened when near smoke.
power.toomanyorigins.pollination.name: Pollination
power.toomanyorigins.pollination.descrip: While you aren't sneaking, your bone meal is infused with pollen, allowing it to additionally affect the 4 adjacent blocks.
power.toomanyorigins.calming_aura.name: Calming Aura
power.toomanyorigins.calming_aura.descri: Animals bred by you do not have to wait to be bred again.
power.toomanyorigins.expendable.name: Expendable
power.toomanyorigins.expendable.descript: You have 3 less hearts of health than humans.
power.toomanyorigins.beekeeper.name: Beekeeper
power.toomanyorigins.beekeeper.descripti: Taking honey and honeycomb from a hive does not anger bees.
power.toomanyorigins.deathly_bite.name: Deathly Bite
power.toomanyorigins.deathly_bite.descri: Your melee attacks inflict a Zombifying effect on non undead mobs for a short time. Hitting any villager that has this effect zombifies them.
power.toomanyorigins.no_helmet_burn.name: Husk of a Former Self
power.toomanyorigins.no_helmet_burn.desc: After 1 minute and 30 seconds of spawning in you burn in sunlight unless headwear is worn.
power.toomanyorigins.cannibalism.name: Cannibalism
power.toomanyorigins.cannibalism.descrip: Rotten Flesh is more nutritious for you.
power.toomanyorigins.opposite_day.name: Opposite Day
power.toomanyorigins.opposite_day.descri: Instant Health and Instant Damage have the reverse effect. You are also immune to Hunger and Zombifying.
power.toomanyorigins.lacerated_liver.des: Foods that aren't rotten flesh are less saturating for you.
death.attack.zombification.player: %1$s rotted away whilst trying to escape %2$s
death.attack.zombification.player.item: %1$s rotted away whilst trying to escape %2$s using %3$s
power.toomanyorigins.black_thumb.name: Black Thumb
power.toomanyorigins.black_thumb.descrip: You spread decay to any overworld crops you plant, making them unable to grow.
You have one extra level of Soul Speed at all times.
power.toomanyorigins.soul_shield.name: Soul Shield
power.toomanyorigins.soul_shield.descrip: When you are at 50% of your maximum health or below, you create a soul projection around yourself, making yourself more resistant to damage and immune to projectiles.
power.toomanyorigins.wither_immunity.des: You are immune to the Wither effect.
power.toomanyorigins.wither_toxins.name: Wither Toxins
power.toomanyorigins.wither_toxins.descr: Your melee attacks inflict the Wither effect for a short time.
power.toomanyorigins.weariness.name: Weariness
power.toomanyorigins.weariness.descripti: As animals are weary around you, you are unable to breed animals.
text.autoconfig.toomanyorigins.title: TooManyOrigins Configuration
